info.name: iStruct API Documentation
info.description:
## Documentation

https://api.istruct.com/?version=latest

## Authorization

To access any endpoint (except fetching access token) you have to be authorized. We use [The OAuth 2.0 Authorization Framework](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749) to grant you access.



## Conventions

All communication is done in REST way and JSON format is used for each request and response.

Every endpoint conforms to open source JSON API 1.0 Specification. You can find everything you need to know about this format in official docs on http://jsonapi.org.



## Filtering

JSON API does not impose filtering params format (http://jsonapi.org/format/#fetching-filtering) so we chose to use it in array like notation.

To use a filter `someFilter` you need to send it as `filter[someFilter]=someValue` query parameter.

Of course you can combine multiple filters like this:

`?filter[someFilter]=someValue&filter[otherFilter]=otherValue`

Some filters allow multiple values. You can pass them in multidimensional array like manner:

`?filter[someFilter][]=firstValue&filter[someFilter][]=secondValue`

This will filter out all records that contain either `firstValue` or `secondValue` in related field.

Please remember that any value that contains URL unsafe characters has to be URL-encoded according to [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) or [RFC 1738](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1738).



## Pagination

JSON API is agnostic about pagination strategy (http://jsonapi.org/format/#fetching-pagination) too so we chose to use page-based strategy.

By default you will fetch first page and first 25 records (other default page size can be specified by endpoints). You can get information about total records count, current page or current page size from `meta` (http://jsonapi.org/format/#document-meta) information.

To fetch other pages or more data you need to send it as `page[number]=2&page[size]=10` query parameters.

Maximum page size may be limited and can be specified by endpoints to prevent sending too much data over single request.



## Data formats

All data is typecasted to best JSON variable formats possible. So numbers are numbers, booleans are booleans and all the rest scalar values are probably strings.

Datetimes in responses are always returned in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) standard with timezones support. Also when using Datetime filtering you MUST use this format (URL-encoded).

Booleans in query params can be represented as: `1`, `true` or `0`, `false`.


## Error responses

First of all you should always check first for HTTP Code (`2xx` - OK, `4xx` - User Request Errors, `5xx` - Server Internal Errors).

When an error occurs it should always contain `error` and `message` fields in response JSON which should help you resolve the issue.

When everything is fine, response will be in JSON API format.

item.name: Authorization

request.description: Generates new OAuth2 JWT token for current client

response.name: Fetch new token

item.description:
To interact with other endpoints your requests have to be authorized using OAuth2 access token.

To obtain a token your application can get it in exchange for API Keys using client credentials grant (id and secret).

item.name: Resources
Shop
Package

request.description:
**Available filters**

| Name                    | Type     | Description                                                             |
|-------------------------|----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| cancelled               | bool     | Has package been cancelled?                                             |
| carrierName             | string   | Exact carrier name                                                      |
| createdFrom             | datetime | `>=` Date when package has been created                                 |
| createdTo               | datetime | `<=` Date when package has been created                                 |
| delivered               | bool     | Has package been delivered?                                             |
| sent                    | bool     | Has package been sent?                                                  |
| trackingNumber          | string   | Exact tracking number                                                   |

**Available sortings**

* id
* createdAt

response.name: Fetch not sent and not cancelled packages
Fetch multiple packages

request.description:
**Package attributes**

| Name                    | Type     | Nullable | Description                                                                         |
|-------------------------|----------|----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| trackingNumber          | string   | Yes      | Package tracking number                                                             |
| trackingUrl             | string   | Yes      | Tracking URL (to external carrier service)                                          |
| carrierName             | string   | Yes      | Carrier of package                                                                  |
| receiver.name           | string   | No       | Entity that is a receiver of package                                                |
| receiver.phone          | string   | No       | Phone number of receiver                                                            |
| receiver.countryId      | string   | No       | [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code |
| receiver.postalCode     | string   | No       | Delivery postal code                                                                |
| receiver.cityName       | string   | No       | Delivery city name                                                                  |
| receiver.street         | string   | No       | Delivery address (street, home number, apartment number                             |
| shipment.isCod          | bool     | No       | Whether this parcel should be COD                                                   |
| shipment.codAmount      | float    | No       | COD amount (important when `shipment.isCod` is `true`)                              |
| shipment.codCurrency    | string   | No       | COD currency symbol ([ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format, important when `shipment.isCod` is `true`) |
| createdAt               | datetime | No       | Date when package has been created                                                  |
| sent                    | bool     | No       | Has package been sent? (Passed to external package handling service)                |
| delivered               | bool     | No       | Has package been delivered?                                                         |
| deliveredAt             | datetime | Yes      | Date when package has been delivered                                                |
| cancelled               | bool     | No       | Has package been cancelled?                                                         |

**Relationships**

* mainOrder - Package main `Order` object
* mainShipment - Package `Shipment` object

response.name: Fetch single package
Fetch single package with main order included

request.description: See `Order` endpoints for details about this response.

response.name: Fetch package main order

request.description: See `Order` endpoints for details about this response.

response.name: Fetch package main shipment

request.description:
You can mark Package as sent by sending PUT request with `sent` field set to `true`.

Please be warned - once Package is marked as sent, **it cannot be unmarked**.

Marking package as sent also changes statuses of related Orders to sent.

You can send package tracking details alongside `sent` field too.

response.name: Marked package as sent
Package already sent
Mark package and set tracking details

request.description:
You can mark Package as delivered by sending PUT request with `delivered` field set to `true`.

Please be warned - once Package is marked as delivered, **it cannot be unmarked**.

Marking package as delivered also changes statuses of related Orders to delivered.

Package has to be marked as sent first in order to mark it as delivered.

response.name: Mark package as delivered
Package has already been delivered

request.description:
You can set tracking details of package:

* Tracking number
* Tracking URL
* Carrier name

response.name: Set package tracking details
Carrier name cannot be empty

item.description: Packages aggregate Orders into a single entity that allows one or more of them to be shipped in one parcel. Package contains one **Main Order** that defines delivery address and shipment type. Main order can contain zero or more **Connected Orders** that should be shipped all together.

item.name: Order

request.description:
**Available filters**

| Name                    | Type     | Description                                                             |
|-------------------------|----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| code                    | string   | Exact order code                                                        |
| currency                | string   | Exact order currency                                                    |
| currentStatusId         | int/int[]| One or more status IDs (see **Order statuses** below)                   |
| createdFrom             | datetime | `>=` Date when order has been created                                   |
| createdTo               | datetime | `<=` Date when order has been created                                   |

**Available sortings**

* id
* createdAt

**Order statuses**

| Status ID | Status name |
|-----------|-------------|
| 1         | new         |
| 2         | paid        |
| 3         | realized    |
| 4         | sent        |
| 5         | delivered   |
| 6         | returned    |
| 7         | cancelled   |

response.name: Fetch multiple orders
Fetch delivered orders

request.description:
**Order attributes**

| Name                    | Type     | Nullable | Description                                                                         |
|-------------------------|----------|----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| code                    | string   | No       | Auto generated, unique order code                                                   |
| currency                | string   | No       | Payment currency symbol ([ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format) |
| amount                  | float    | No       | Total amount for order in `currency`                                                |
| points                  | float    | No       | Total points for order (for calculating commissions)                                |
| orderer.name            | string   | No       | Entity that placed this order                                                       |
| orderer.isCompany       | bool     | No       | Whether order has been placed on behalf of a company entity                         |
| orderer.companyName     | string   | Yes      | When `isCompany = true` this name is filled                                         |
| orderer.phone           | string   | No       | Phone number of orderer                                                             |
| orderer.email           | string   | No       | E-mail address of orderer                                                           |
| orderer.address.countryId | string | No       | [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code |
| orderer.address.postalCode| string | No       | Orderer postal code                                                                 |
| orderer.address.cityName  | string | No       | Orderer city name                                                                   |
| orderer.address.street    | string | No       | Orderer address (street, home number, apartment number                              |
| orderer.address.annotations | string | Yes    | Orderer annotations or remarks regarding this order                                 |
| orderer.vatNumber       | string   | Yes      | When `isCompany = true` this number is filled (used for invoicing)                  |
| orderer.isVatEu         | bool     | No       | Whether `vatNumber` is an EU VAT Number                                             |
| delivery.name           | string   | No       | Order receiver name                                                                 |
| delivery.phone          | string   | No       | Phone number for delivery                                                           |
| delivery.countryId      | string   | No       | [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code |
| delivery.postalCode     | string   | No       | Delivery postal code                                                                |
| delivery.cityName       | string   | No       | Delivery city name                                                                  |
| delivery.street         | string   | No       | Delivery address (street, home number, apartment number                             |
| createdAt               | datetime | No       | Date when order has been placed                                                     |
| currentStatusId         | bool     | No       | Current order status (see **Order statuses** table)                                 |
| currentStatusUpdatedAt  | datetime | No       | Date when order has reached current status                                          |
| shipSalesDocument       | bool     | No       | Whether physical copy of sales document should be inserted into package? (Customer wish) |

**Relationships**

* payment - Order `Payment` object
* shipment - Order `Shipment` object
* items - Order `Item` collection
* connectedOrders - Orders connected to this order
* salesDocument - An `Invoice` object or null

response.name: Fetch single order

request.description:
**Item attributes**

| Name                    | Type     | Nullable | Description                                                                         |
|-------------------------|----------|----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| number                  | int      | No       | Ordinal number of product in order                                                  |
| name                    | string   | No       | Product name                                                                        |
| code                    | string   | No       | Product item code shown in eCommerce                                                |
| barcode                 | string   | Yes      | Product item barcode                                                                |
| warehouseCode           | string   | No       | Product item warehouse code                                                         |
| quantity                | int      | No       | Purchased product quantity                                                          |
| price                   | float    | No       | Product price per single unit                                                       |
| points                  | float    | No       | Product points per single unit (used for commissions calculation)                   |
| taxPercent              | int      | No       | Product tax percent                                                                 |
| weight                  | float    | No       | Product weight per single unit                                                      |
| orderId                 | int      | No       | ID of order to which this item belongs                                              |

response.name: Fetch order items
Fetch order connected orders
No connected orders

request.description:
**Payment attributes**

| Name                    | Type     | Nullable | Description                                                                         |
|-------------------------|----------|----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| typeId                  | int      | No       | ID of payment type                                                                  |
| name                    | string   | No       | Payment type name                                                                   |
| amount                  | float    | No       | Payment amount                                                                      |
| orderId                 | int      | No       | ID of order to which this payment belongs                                           |

response.name: Fetch order payment

request.description:
**Shipment attributes**

| Name                    | Type     | Nullable | Description                                                                         |
|-------------------------|----------|----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| typeId                  | int      | No       | ID of shipment type                                                                 |
| isCod                   | bool     | No       | Whether shipment is COD                                                             |
| name                    | string   | No       | Shipment type name                                                                  |
| cost                    | float    | No       | Shipment cost                                                                       |
| orderId                 | int      | No       | ID of order to which this shipment belongs                                          |

response.name: Fetch order shipment

request.description:
**Sales document attributes**

| Name                    | Type     | Nullable | Description                                                                         |
|-------------------------|----------|----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| title                   | string   | No       | Title of sales document                                                             |
| currency                | string   | No       | Currency of document                                                                |
| amount                  | float    | No       | Total amount on document                                                            |
| soldAt                  | datetime | No       | Datetime of sale                                                                    |
| issuedAt                | datetime | No       | Datetime of document issuing                                                        |
| file.name               | string   | No       | Document file name                                                                  |
| file.extension          | string   | No       | Document file extension (pdf)                                                       |
| file.mime               | string   | No       | Document file mimetype (application/pdf)                                            |
| file.size               | int      | No       | Document file size in bytes                                                         |
| file.contents           | string   | No       | Document file contents encoded in base64                                            |
| orderId                 | int      | No       | ID of order to which this sales document belongs                                    |

response.name: Fetch order sales document

request.description:
**Order attributes**

| Name                    | Type     | Nullable | Description                                                                         |
|-------------------------|----------|----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| orderer.firstName       | string   | No       | First name of entity that placed this order                                         |
| orderer.lastName        | string   | No       | Last name of entity that placed this order                                          |
| orderer.isCompany       | bool     | No       | Whether order has been placed on behalf of a company entity                         |
| orderer.companyName     | string   | Yes      | When `isCompany = true` this name is filled                                         |
| orderer.phone           | string   | No       | Phone number of orderer                                                             |
| orderer.email           | string   | No       | E-mail address of orderer                                                           |
| orderer.address.countryId | string | No       | [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code |
| orderer.address.regionCode | string | Depends  | This field might be required depending on configuration of your iStruct instance |
| orderer.address.postalCode| string | No       | Orderer postal code                                                                 |
| orderer.address.cityName  | string | No       | Orderer city name                                                                   |
| orderer.address.street    | string | No       | Orderer address (street, home number, apartment number                              |
| orderer.address.annotations | string | Yes    | Orderer annotations or remarks regarding this order                                 |
| orderer.vatNumber       | string   | Yes      | When `isCompany = true` this number is filled (used for invoicing)                  |
| orderer.isVatEu         | bool     | No       | Whether `vatNumber` is an EU VAT Number                                             |
| delivery.firstName      | string   | No       | Order receiver first name                                                          |
| delivery.lastName       | string   | No       | Order receiver last name                                                            |
| delivery.phone          | string   | No       | Phone number for delivery                                                           |
| delivery.countryId      | string   | No       | [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code |
| delivery.regionCode     | string   | Depends  | This field might be required depending on configuration of your iStruct instance |
| delivery.postalCode     | string   | No       | Delivery postal code                                                                |
| delivery.cityName       | string   | No       | Delivery city name                                                                  |
| delivery.street         | string   | No       | Delivery address (street, home number, apartment number                             |
| shipSalesDocument       | bool     | No       | Whether physical copy of sales document should be inserted into package? (Customer wish) |
| items.[].code              | string   | No       | Item code of ordered product                                                     |
| items.[].quantity       | integer  | No       | Ordered quantity of given item                                                      |
| shipmentTypeCode        | string   | No       | Shipment type code, which can be fetched via **ShipmentType** endpoint                |
| paymentTypeCode        | string   | No       | Payment type code, which can be fetched via **PaymentType** endpoint                   |
| warehouseId            | integer  | No      | if your iStruct instance allows users to directly change the warehouse they are using, you can change it here as well. Otherwise, this field is not directly accessible. |

**Relationships**

* user - ID of iStruct's user that performs this order (required)

**Notes**
You can skip entire orderer or delivery fields if you want to use user's profile data instead.

response.name: Add single order

item.description: Shop Order contains at least one product **Item**, exactly one **Shipment** and exactly one **Payment** objects. It can contain zero or more **Connected Orders** and zero or exactly one **Sales Document** objects.

item.name: ShipmentType

response.name: Fetch multiple shipment types

item.description: This endpoint returns information about shipment methods available in your iStruct instance via API. Every shipment type has a unique code, which is required when creating **Order** via api.

item.name: PaymentType

response.name: Fetch multiple payment types

item.description: This endpoint returns information about payment methods available in your iStruct instance via API. Every payment type has a unique code, which is required when creating **Order** via api.

iStruct Shop modules support full eCommerce flow. Products and categories management, order and payment processing with external gateways, shipping packages via carriers or brokers, invoicing and much more.

Manage or view iStruct resources.

**All endpoints require Bearer access token.**
